title: Very similar to Courier or Lucida?
content:
Need help identifying this one, please.

Font: 

 Archer 

Solved By: 

 [Frode Bo Helland](http://web.archive.org/web/20150417104344/http:/typophile.com/user/17101 "View user profile.")

comments.content: Right on the money! Thank you so much Frode Bo Helland for identifying this font as Archer. Fabulous way to start the day!
